name: Oil Invasion
description:
Game story:


Evil army from East has captured all world oil barrels. Those barrels are hidden for 5 different maps. Player has several weapons like shotgun,pistol and rocket launcher. Several different enemies like melee warrior, shooting bug and big flamethrower monsters are guarding oil barrels. There are also some doors that need different objects like stars to open. So destroy enemies and find captured oil barrels in this FPS shooter

Features::

- 6 different themed levels
- Melee weapons
- Weapons like : Shotgun,Pistol,Rocket launcher
- Door that can open with finding stars
- 3 enemies: Melee warrior, Shooting bug and biggest Flamethrower monster
- Steam achievements
